## useUnmount() function

Use `ComponentWillUnmount`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useUnmount(cleanup: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cleanup | () =&gt; void | Callback to run on unmount. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
